Content.title: Dick Gennissen
Content.name: Dick Gennissen
Content.bodyText:
Hi Darren,

We also have experienced this issue with Umbraco 4.7.0 and did not find any reason why the umbraco.config was empty.

Strange this was, when we republished the entire site (from content-node) also nothing happend. The cmsContentXml table was also empty.

Was this also the case when you have encountered this issue?
